metadata.title: CVE-2013-4938 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The LTI (aka IMS-LTI) mod_form implementation in Moodle through 2.1.10,2.2.x before 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.8, 2.4.x before 2.4.5, and 2.5.xbefore 2.5.1 does not properly support the sendname, sendemailaddr, andacceptgrades settings, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation in opportunistic circumstances by leveraging an environment inwhich there was an ineffective attempt to enable the more secure values.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1').
